text: William Gladstone Stewart (15 July 1933 â€“ 21 September 2017) was an English television producer, director, and host. He was best known as the presenter and producer of the Channel 4 general quiz show Fifteen to One from 1988 to 2003. He was born in Habrough, Lincolnshire, England. His notable television direction includes episodes of Love Thy Neighbour, Father, Dear Father and Public Eye Stewart died on 21 September 2017 at the age of 84. ==References== ==Other websites== * *UK Gameshows Page: William G. title: William G. Stewart
